items.sentence: Have you changed your mind about becoming a pilot?
Have you ever seen a shark over three meters long?
Have you got anything special in mind for tonight?
All of the girls in class have their ears pierced.
Are you already thinking of a replacement for Tom?
I\'m supposed to go to Boston the week after next.
How do you cope with so many people disliking you?
Tom told Mary that he was going to give her a car.
Tom told Mary that he was going to try to do that.
That\'s not really why you don\'t like Tom, is it?
Tom reached for the book, but it was out of reach.
Tom rented an apartment in Boston for three years.
What\'s the second most visited city in the world?
I haven\'t yet watched the videos you recommended.
I know a lot of people who don\'t like doing that.
Anybody who doesn\'t want to go, doesn\'t have to.
I know it\'s highly unlikely that anyone knows me.
I know that it\'s highly unlikely anyone knows me.
Maybe we shouldn\'t have stayed in Boston so long.
I\'m the one who convinced Tom to quit doing that.
